  • Image & Sound Mastery: Clone character voices and transform visuals to enhance storytelling.
  • Diverse Anime Templates: Access templates for various genres like adventure, romance, fantasy, and anime crossovers.
  • Social Sharing: Share your anime stories as videos with friends or connect with like-minded creators in the community.

Data Safety:

The developer states that this app may collect data types such as app activity, in-app search history, and other user-generated content. However, data is not encrypted in transit. Users can request that data be deleted.
